definition: to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Get your story straight and tell the truth for once for heaven's sake.
sentences.chinese: 看在老天的份上你要是編不圓謊就說一次實話吧。

sentences.english: Then you lied about lying, okay?
sentences.chinese: 然後，你又說謊去圓謊，好嗎？

definition: lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
